data.title: KSI vs. Tommy Fury: Date, start time, TV channel and live stream
data.meta_description:

data.text:
It's finally fight week in Manchester for what is the biggest fight card in crossover boxing.

In the main event, KSI and Tommy Fury will finally settle their differences after months of verbal sparring.

Fury is confident that he can produce a first round knockout against the British entertainment star, but KSI's awkward style will be something Fury will not have faced during his five years in professional boxing.

Here's everything you need to know ahead of KSI vs. Tommy Fury.

KSI vs. Tommy Fury date, start time

Date: Saturday, October 14

Start time: 7 p.m. UK / 2 p.m. ET

Main event ringwalks (approx): 10:50 p.m. UK / 5:50 p.m. ET

The main card is set to get underway at 7 p.m. UK / 2 p.m. ET with the main event ringwalks scheduled for 10:50 p.m. UK / 5:50 p.m. ET. These timings could change due to the length of the undercard fights.

Can I watch KSI vs. Tommy Fury on DAZN?

The card will stream live on DAZN and DAZN PPV in over 200 countries across the globe. For more information, click here.

Viewers in France need to order on YouTube PPV.

However if you are in Argentina, Chile and Colombia you must download the DAZN app from the Apple App Store or Android Google Play store and then sign up from there, rather than via web browser.

What devices are supported by DAZN?

DAZN has apps available for all of the following platforms: Apple TV, Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV, Amazon Fire Stick, Amazon Fire Tablet, Android Phone & Tablet, iPhone & iPad, Android TV, LG, Smart TV, Panasonic Smart TV, Samsung Smart TV, Sony Smart TV, SmartCast, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Roku.

Here is a full list of the devices where DAZN is available, in addition to web browsers on DAZN.com (if you are in Argentina, Chile and Colombia you must download the DAZN app from the Apple App Store or Android Google Play store and then sign up from there, rather than via web browser):

How to watch on Sky Channel 495

DAZN subscribers with access to DAZN 1 HD channel 429 can also purchase DAZN Pay Per View events to watch on DAZN PPV HD channel 495.

Please note you need a DAZN subscription plan to purchase Pay Per View events. More info here

How to watch if you’re a Virgin Media customer

Virgin Media customers in the UK can order DAZN X Series: The Prime Card and watch the event directly on their Virgin set top box. Every PPV order includes one-month access to the DAZN app. More information on how to redeem the one-month DAZN access will be provided on-screen during the fight night broadcast.

How to order DAZN X Series: The Prime Card on your Virgin box:

Virgin customers with a TiVo and/or V6 set-top-box

Press Home or On Demand on your remote control and go to:

On Demand > Live Events

Then pressing the red button

Virgin customers with a Virgin TV 360 or Stream set-top-box

Press Home on your remote control and go to:

‘Pay Per View Live Events’ rail/section

Then pressing OK

Where is KSI vs. Tommy Fury?

The fight will take place at the AO Arena in Manchester, England.

KSI record and bio

Nationality: British

Date of birth: June 19, 1993

Height: 6' 0"

Reach: 76"

Total fights: 6

Record: 5-0-1 (4 KOs)

Tommy Fury record and bio

Nationality: British

Date of birth: May 7, 1999

Height: 6' 0"

Reach: N/A

Total fights: 9

Record: 9-0 (4 KOs)

KSI vs. Tommy Fury fight card

Main Card

KSI vs. Tommy Fury; For the Misfits cruiserweight title

Logan Paul vs. Dillon Danis; Heavyweight

Salt Papi vs. Slim; For the Misfits middleweight title

Deen the Great vs. Walid Sharks; For the Misfits lightweight title

King Kenny vs. Anthony Taylor; For the Misfits light heavyweight title

Whindersson Nunes Batista vs. My Mate Nate; For the Misfits light heavyweight title

Nichlmao & Alex Wassabi vs. Luis Pineda & B Dave; For the Misfits tag team title

Preliminary Card
